testcase.name: TC14_place_order_register_while_checkout
testcase.system-out: Given launch browser........................................................passed And navigate to url.........................................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Add products to cart....................................................passed And Click Cart button.......................................................passed And Verify that cart page is displayed......................................passed And Click Proceed To Checkout...............................................passed And Click Register Login button.............................................passed When Enter name and email address...........................................passed And Click Signup button.....................................................passed And Verify that ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION is visible........................passed And Fill details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth...............passed And Select checkbox Sign up for our newsletter!.............................passed And Select checkbox Receive special offers from our partners!...............passed And Fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed And Click Create Account button.............................................passed Then user verifies that acount is created...................................passed When user clicks continue button............................................passed And user verifies that logged in............................................passed And Click Cart button.......................................................passed And Click Proceed To Checkout button........................................passed And Verify Address Details and Review Your Order............................passed And Enter description in comment text area and click Place Order............passed And Enter payment details: Name on Card, Card Number, CVC, Expiration date..passed And Click Pay and Confirm Order button......................................passed Then Verify success message Your order has been placed successfully!........passed And user clicks delete account button.......................................passed Then user verifies that acount deleted......................................passed
